excerpt: "Despite Arm's notable successes in CPUs with Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL), Amazon.Com Inc (NASDAQ: AMZN), Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ: NVDA), and Oracle Corp (NYSE: ORCL), the data center ecosystem is firmly in the hands of Nvidia on the GPU side, and Intel Corp (NASDAQ: INTC) and Advanced Micro Devices, Inc (NASDAQ: AMD) on the CPU side."
